name: Can you find the best banana in the world ?
name_original: Can you find the best banana in the world ?
description:
You're a monkey with SuperMonkey abilities. You have to find the best banana in the world. Your ability is to stretch you arm. You have to sneak in house to "borrow" bananas. In the end you'll find the best banana in the world. Maybe...

Controls :

  • WAD/Arrow Keys -> Move.
  • R -> Restart
  • Escape -> Pause
  • Space -> Next Level (If you are in the win screen)

Screenshots :

VERY IMPORTANT NOTE : SWITCH THE GAME TO FULLSCREEN IF YOU CANT GET TO THE FRIDGE. A LOT OF PEOPLE WAS NOT ABLE TO PLAY THE GAME FOR THIS REASON. THNX !!!
